Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain as executive chairman and will advise Page and Sergey Brin , Google Inc. 's other co-founder. Sergey Brin will give up his title as co-president to work on high-priority projects.

, Calif.-- Google co-founder Larry Page will take charge of the company's day-to-day operations as chief executive officer, replacing current CEO Eric Schmidt , who will focus on strategic projects and new products.
